I have tapped into a power that is both ancient and primal, a power that courses through the very flesh of my enemies. And it is this power that I wield to assert my dominance over those who would follow me.

To ensure that my dominance is recognized and respected, I would first and foremost lead by example. I would demonstrate my strength, my cunning, and my ruthlessness to those who would dare to question my authority. I would show them the true meaning of power, and the consequences of crossing me.

My followers would be witness to my feats of strength, as I take down my enemies with ease and precision. They would see the fear in the eyes of those who dare to oppose me, and they would know that I am the one who inspires that fear. They would see the bodies of my enemies, broken and battered, and they would know that I am the one who has brought them low.

And then, I would share my power with them. I would invite them to partake in the ritual of consumption, to taste the flesh of our enemies and to feel the surge of power that comes with it. They would experience the rush of adrenaline, the sense of exhilaration, and the feeling of invincibility that comes with consuming the flesh of those who would do us harm.

As they partake in this ritual, they would be bound to me, body and soul. They would be mine, completely and utterly, and they would know that to cross me would be to invite destruction upon themselves. They would be my loyal followers, my disciples, and my instruments of terror.

And to maintain my dominance, I would continually test their loyalty, pushing them to their limits, and beyond. I would challenge them to prove their worth, to demonstrate their commitment to our cause, and to show their devotion to me. Those who fail would be cast aside, or worse, and those who succeed would be rewarded with power, with prestige, and with the privilege of standing by my side.

In this way, I would ensure that my dominance is recognized and respected among my followers. I would be the one who holds the power, who wields the authority, and who inspires the fear and the awe of those who follow me.
